title: Formal all caps font with curved Y
content:
The Y is the most recognizable glyph, with its curved arms. The entire face is strongly influenced with formal hand-lettering. I’ve especially seen it used with religious materials.

I’m pretty sure it’s commonly used and readily available, but after quite a bit of searching nothing’s turned up. I suspect it might be an Adobe product.

author: Jchthys

comments.content: Ah, I guess the compression would account for it. Thanks.

Thanks Akira. Indeed it is.  
Don
